abstracts.cdata!:
Through this Second Power Project, Zaire
            hopes to (a) ensure a reliable supply of electrical energy
            to the main interconnected networks of Bukavu, Goma, Uvira
            and Kiliba; (b) make use of the electric energy within the
            Zaire (Kivu) - Rwanda - Burundi interconnected system; and
            (c) strengthen Societe Nationale d'Electricite (SNEL)
            as an institution.  These objectives will be achieved
            through several methods.  The first will be accomplished by
            (i) rehabilitating the existing Ruzizi I plant and the
            distribution networks of (a); (ii) completing the
            rehabilitation of the generation stations and transmission
            and distribution system in the Shaba Region; and (iii)
            carrying out urgent maintenance works and improving
            operation of the Inga hydropower complex.  Secondly, optimal
            use of electric energy will be achieved through increasing
            the transmission and distribution capacity of the
            electricity network in that portion of the Kivu region where
            there is considerable suppressed demand. Finally, SNEL will
            be strengthened through better planning, rational pricing,
            improved financial policies and training of its staff.
